var fs = require('fs');
var file = require('file');
var Remarkable = require('remarkable');
var polyfills = require('./polyfills.json');
var viewRoot = fs.realpathSync(__dirname + '/../feature-detects');
 
function metadata(cb) {
  var tests = [];
  var md = new Remarkable();
